vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_7.sol#21-28):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_amount)() (patch_7.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_7.sol#24)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: newMessage in Log.addMessage (patch_7.sol#45) is a local variable never initialiazed

solc-version
